meanings.sent1: The bumpy car ride made me queasier with each turn.
meanings.sent2: She looked queasier after eating the expired food.
meanings.sent3: The thought of eating snails made him queasier than a rollercoaster ride.
meanings.sent4: The smell of rotten eggs was queasier than a horror movie.
meanings.sent5: The queasier feeling in my stomach lingered long after the boat ride.

meanings.definition: Causing a feeling of sickness or nausea.
meanings.sent1: The queasier smell from the garbage bin made everyone cover their noses.
meanings.sent2: The spoiled milk had a queasier taste than expected.
meanings.sent3: The prank of fake bugs in her salad was queasier than she had imagined.
meanings.sent4: The queasier music video left a lasting impression on the viewers.
meanings.sent5: The queasier sight of the moldy bread turned my stomach instantly.
